description.en: A poison antidote. This vial will instantly cure poison effects when consumed.
description.ar: A poison antidote. This vial will instantly cure poison effects when consumed.
description.br: Um antídoto extraído de Doridomas selvagens. Este frasco irá curar instantaneamente efeitos de envenenamento quando consumido.
description.cns: 从蓝纹海马中提取出的解毒剂，使用后可以瞬间解除中毒效果。
description.de: Neutralisiert das Gift, wenn du von einem Monster vergiftet wurdest.
description.fi: A poison antidote. This vial will instantly cure poison effects when consumed.
description.fil: A poison antidote. This vial will instantly cure poison effects when consumed.
description.fr: Un antidote contre le poison. Cette fiole guérit instantanément les effets du poison lorsqu'elle est consommée.
description.id: Sebuah penawar racun. Vial ini akan langsung menyembuhkan efek racun saat dikonsumsi.
description.it: A poison antidote. This vial will instantly cure poison effects when consumed.
description.jp: 毒の解毒剤。この小瓶を飲むと、毒の効果を瞬時に治すことができます。
description.kr: 독약 해독제. 이 약병을 섭취하면 즉시 독 효과를 치료합니다.
description.nl: A poison antidote. This vial will instantly cure poison effects when consumed.
description.pl: A poison antidote. This vial will instantly cure poison effects when consumed.
description.ru: Антидот, полученный из диких коньков. При применении излечивает от эффекта яда.
description.sp: Un antídoto contra el veneno. Al consumir este vial te curarás de los efectos del veneno de inmediato.
description.sw: A poison antidote. This vial will instantly cure poison effects when consumed.
description.th: poison antidote สิ่งนี้จะรักษาพิษทันทีเมื่อดื่ม
description.tw: 使用之後立即解除中毒效果。
description.vi: Một loại thuốc giải độc. Lọ này sẽ ngay lập tức chữa khỏi hiệu ứng độc khi tiêu thụ.
